references.paper_title: Transformers in time series: A survey
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of transformers in time series, establishing a broad context for the research in the paper.

references.paper_title: RWKV: Reinventing rnns for the transformer era
references.reason: This paper introduces the RWKV architecture, which is fundamental to the proposed model's design and performance.

references.paper_title: Timer: Generative pre-trained transformers are large time series models
references.reason: This paper presents the Timer model, which is the baseline model that the proposed Rimer model is compared against.
This paper introduces Deep Equilibrium Models (DEQ), which inspires the implicit RWKV-7 layers in this paper.

references.paper_title: Meta-learning approaches to selecting time series models
references.reason: This paper establishes the theoretical basis for meta-learning, a crucial component of the proposed model's state update rule.
